amendment.description: To clarify the requirement to include cautionary statements on advertisements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4112 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4112 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S1669, S1693-1696; text: CR S1694) To clarify the requirement to include cautionary statements on advertisements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4112 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4112 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Boxer.
